@oxog/seo

Purpose:
- Zero-runtime-dependency on-page SEO analyzer with deterministic scoring.
- Optional AI enhancement over OpenAI-compatible HTTP APIs.

Public API:
- createSeoAnalyzer(config)
- analyzer.analyzeSync(input)
- analyzer.analyze(input)
- analyzer.analyzeBatchSync(inputs)
- analyzer.analyzeBatch(inputs)
- analyzer.addRule(rule)
- analyzer.use(plugin)
- analyzer.getRules()
- analyzer.format(report)
- analyzer.formatMarkdown(report)
- analyzer.formatHtml(report)
- analyzer.formatCsv(reports)

Config:
- locale: "en" | "tr"
- profile: "blog" | "product" | "landing" | "news" | "documentation" | "ecommerce"
- depth: "quick" | "standard" | "full"
- enabledCategories: optional category allow-list
- ai: optional { enabled, baseUrl, apiKey, model, timeoutMs, ruleWeight, aiWeight }

Scoring:
- 10 categories
- 107 built-in rules
- weighted category scoring by profile
- grade mapping A+ to F
- mode is "rule-only" or "hybrid"

Depth behavior:
- quick: content, meta, keyword, technical
- standard: quick + structure, readability, eeat
- full: all categories

Compare utilities:
- diffReports(previous, next)
- analyzeTrend(reports)
- benchmarkReport(report, benchmarkScore)

Operational notes:
- analyzeSync never performs network requests.
- analyze may call AI endpoint when enabled.
- AI failures do not fail analysis; returns deterministic fallback.
- Runtime dependencies must remain empty.
